question:
Which of the following appointments are made by the President of India by warrant under his sign and seal?
(a) Judges of the Supreme Court of India
(b) Governor of a State
(c) Chairman of the Union Public Service Commission
(d) Attorney-General of India
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Comptroller and Audit-General, judges of Supreme court and governors are appointed by the President of India by warrant under his hand and seal.
